abstract: Tennis Roundup; second-seeded Kevin Anderson of South Africa defeats France's Pierre-Hugues Herbert, 6-4, 7-5, in Winston-Salem Open final in North Carolina; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Anderson, the South African second seed, knocked off the Frenchman Pierre-Hugues Herbert at the Winston-Salem Open to win his first ATP Tour event since 2012.

headline.main: Kevin Anderson Captures Title and Ends Long Drought
headline.print_headline: South African Captures Title and Ends Long Drought

snippet: Anderson, the South African second seed, knocked off the Frenchman Pierre-Hugues Herbert at the Winston-Salem Open to win his first ATP Tour event since 2012.
